subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador won the Vuelta de Castilla y León time trial in Zamora, Spain. Contador, the Tour de France champion, completed the seven-mile course in 13 minutes 42 seconds.
snippet: Alberto Contador won the Vuelta de Castilla y León time trial in Zamora, Spain. Contador, the Tour de France champion, completed the seven-mile course in 13 minutes 42 seconds.
